jobDescription: About Us We are a growing company with a solid customer base, excellent compensation and benefits, and a collaborative yet flexible work environment. If you enjoy challenging projects, using new technologies to deliver innovative business solutions, and you're interested in working for an entrepreneurial company, we may have a home for you.We are looking for Data Analyst to join our CX solutions team. At PTP, we value aptitude and creativity as well as experience. We are a diverse organization and are looking for bright, passionate and committed professionals who strive to be the best at what they do.ResponsibilitiesWork with large amounts of data to find trends and areas for improvement based on business and operational goalsDrive business and technical requirements in order to improving data analysisPresent findings with an ability to write and speak clearly while communicating complex ideasRequirementsA bachelor's degree in mathematics, statistics or related fieldStrong math and analysis skillsExperience with statistical tools like R, SAS, Matlab, SPSS, Stata and reporting tools such as HighChartsExperience writing SQL queries​DesiredUnixGroovy or PERLWorking knowledge of JSONSalary is DOE and is extremely competitive. We are able to offer relocation assistance to the right candidate.
